name: Feature Creep (pedroalmeida-dev)
description:
Game developed for Ludum Dare 40, where I was one of the programmers.

A world of possibilities...

However...

The more you have, the worse it is.

Build your way by adding popular features on this side-view 2D story-diven platformer game.

Just keep adding features and see where it leads you.

Controls:

The premise of the game lends itself to some weird controls, but don’t be afraid!

  • [A][D] - Move character
  • [W] - Jump
  • [Q] - Use sword
  • [Left Mouse] - Use arrows
  • [Spacebar] - Use spell
  • [E] - Punch
  • [1-0 Numbers] - Change spell type
  • [Left Shift] - Sprint
  • [F] - Dash
